title: Mark Zuckerberg's Congressional Testimony: Non-Answers and Robo-Sorries | Karlie Kloss
itunes:title: Mark Zuckerberg's Congressional Testimony: Non-Answers and Robo-Sorries | Karlie Kloss
description:
A rumor surfaces that Donald Trump secretly fathered an employee's child, Mark Zuckerberg repeatedly apologizes to Congress, and Karlie Kloss discusses Kode with Klossy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
